name: Our Journeys 3 ~ A Collection of Visual Novels
name_original: Our Journeys 3 ~ A Collection of Visual Novels
description:
A collection of 3 stories in various genres, with RPG-lite elements.

A.L.A.N.

Alex, Lily, Aimé and Nana must protect their town from monsters.

Denis vs Dark Fairies

Denis freed the Dark Fairies and he must stop them.

Witch Shirina

Two girls must stop Shirina, a wicked witch.
